title: Whatsapp Booking Assistant
shortDescription: Built an AI-powered Whatsapp booking assistant for a chauffeur service company
fullDescription: We developed an AI-powered Whatsapp booking assistant for a chauffeur service company. The assistant is able to handle bookings, cancellations, and inquiries from customers.

title: Call Assistant
shortDescription: Built an AI-powered call assistant for a delivery company
fullDescription: We developed an AI-powered call assistant for a delivery company. The assistant is able to handle calls, inquiries, and bookings from customers.

title: Logistics Assistant
shortDescription: Built an AI-powered tool to track and manage orders for a healthcare company
fullDescription: We developed an AI-powered tool to track and manage orders for a healthcare company. The tool is able to track and manage orders for a healthcare company.

title: Customer Support Assistant for a Car Dealership
shortDescription: Built an AI-powered tool to handle customer support for a car dealership
fullDescription: We developed an AI-powered tool to handle customer support for a car dealership. The tool is able to handle customer support for a car dealership by answering questions about the cars, pricing, and availability.
